description: Designed to match the iconic ORA Xpore jacket, this ski bib is made with their new Xpore layer. Freedom of movement and ergonomics, dedicated to mountain skiing as well as all terrain. Its exterior sobriety is in contrast with the bright interiors with multiple chevron waterproofing strips of the year 2022. Ride on.
name: Black Crows Ora Xpore Ripstop Bib Pants - Mens
